Reviews.Title: “Romantic and beautiful”
Reviews.Author: Kabuki
Reviews.Content: A lovely hotel on the Grand Canal. Everything you would want. Not inexpensive, but then nothing is, in Venice. We splurged on a junior suite over looking the canal. Everything red and gold and dreamy. The included breakfast includes coffee and fruit and croissants and eggs and much more. Everything you need to get you to the Guggenheim. The service is first rate. Beautiful and well located.

Reviews.Title: “Venice Perfection”
Reviews.Author: canuck22SanFrancisco
Reviews.Content: The Sant Angelo is perfectly situated on the Grand Canal at the water bus stop of the same name, which gives easy access to everywhere in Venice. The rooms are large and comfortable with old fashioned decor. The service and housekeeping are excellent and the breakfast sets you up for the day. Views from the bar are extraordinary. Getting home is no problem on any water taxi number 1, every ten minutes. Our preference would be for a quiet room on the back or side as the canals can get noisy in the early AM.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: bayberry39
Reviews.Content: What a great Hotel! The people were all so nice. It was our first time in Italy and this hotel is a treasurer. We were very pampered. Our room overlooked the Grand Canal and it was beautiful and the room was large and had great closet space and bathroom was incredible.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location and wonderful rooms”
Reviews.Author: annettet
Reviews.Content: I travelled with my mum who is waiting a hip replacement and wanted a hotel easy to get to the ferry this hotel is on the grand canel and you can see rialto bridge and the stop was just down from the hotel with wonderful views so you cant beat the location and the rooms were lovely just as the photos on the website, Venice is not cheap but I thought this hotel was worth the extra splurg to treat my mum and have a convienient location

Reviews.Title: “GREAT VALUE”
Reviews.Author: Cholstc
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel after reading reviews on Tripadvisor. What a great find. It was ideally located near the San Marco Plaza. The rooms were basic but spacious enough. They had televisions (no clocks) and nice bathrooms. We had air conditioning. The breakfast buffet was very satisfying. The staff was pleasant. The hotel was very clean. We had two rooms and were traveling with two teenagers so the reasonable price and the breakfast buffet came in very handy. I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Wandering_Golfer
Reviews.Content: Sant Angelo is in a great location - near the Rialto and St.Marks sq and is right on the canal with its own dock and boat stop right there...they have a small breakfast and well equipped rooms that were clean and a very nice breakfast - we thought it was a little much - we paid 275 euros a night - and our room had a garden view - but we would reccomend it to anyone staying in venice

Reviews.Title: “First Class Hotel”
Reviews.Author: FearlessFlyer
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the Palazzo Sant Angelo on Sunday August 6th at dusk just in time to view the grand canal at its finest. The best thing about this hotel ,outside of its charm and hospitality is its location. Literally 150 ft off the Valporetta #1 Sant Angelo stop!!. Its water front entrance is 1 of a kind and has an ideal location for all of Venice. The staff was extremly courteous and the rooms very clean and well appointed with fabric wallpaper not seen in 4 star hotels. It is listed in the SBH (Small Boutique Hotels guide) as one of the top picks in Italy. The breakfest buffett was equally as charming with a friendly atmosphere and plenty to choose from. The hotel arranged a tour to Murano at one of thier suggested factories. There are many confusing issues over the hotels and thier affiliations to the Murano factories, in our case we were very pleased with the selection and had a great expierence provided you know what you want and what you are willing to pay. As a high end hotel we were treated to a high end factory. I have traveled all over the world and I would highly recommend this hotel.
